title: Kim Kardashian posts epic bikini throwback pic of 'hot mom' Kris Jenner
text:

Kim Kardashian has rolled back the years by sharing an incredible throwback pic of momager, Kris Jenner.

The 38-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has been in a reflective mood in the past week, posting a pic of herself with sister Kourtney before a family trip to Armenia.

Now she has turned her attention to her mother Kris, sharing a photo from the 80's of her posing poolside in a bikini with family friend Faye Resnick.

Kim was gushing in her praise for Kris, captioning the snap: "I mean... who is hotter than my mom after giving birth to [my] brother!"

As Rob Kardashian was born in 1987, this would date the photo towards the end of the 80's, as Kris rocks a zebra print bikini.

(Image: Instagram)

Some commenters thought that Kris bore a striking resemblance to her daughter Khloe Kardashian and you can certainly see similarities, especially in the shape of the face.

Kim is currently in Armenia with Kourtney and their children, as well as Kim's husband, rapper Kanye West .

Kim and Kanye had Saint, Chicago and Psalm baptised on Monday in Etchmiadzin Cathedral, Vagharshapat, which is one of the world's oldest cathedrals.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The good news for reality TV fans is that the visit has been filmed for KUWTK, with a source telling E! News: "It's always been Kim's plan to have all of her children baptized in Armenia to pay homage to her father and her cultural heritage."

Kim and Kourtney have alsosat down for dinner with Armenian President Armen Sarkissian on Tuesday night.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Appearing comfortable as she strolled through Sarkissian's Presidential palace in Yerevan, Armenia, with the leader and her sibling, Kim enjoyed an intimate dinner with Sarkissian and a select few guests - including his wife Nouneh Sarkissian.

Before returning to the United States, Kim is reportedly going to take the kids sightseeing, so they will be heading to the tourist areas of the country before heading home.
